name: Tiny Warriors: Power Up
description:
Help the Tiny Warriors on their epic adventure!

The Tiny Warriors are trapped inside the digital world and need your help to escape. Choose from the 5 warriors, each with their own special abilities and make moves to create a path to freedom for your heroes. Fun for all ages!

Features:
- 5 unique characters. Lion, Fox, Monkey, Porcupine and Eagle
- Lots of fun and challenging puzzles
- Leaderboards and Achievements
- Beautiful graphics and animations
